overview: "Mitzi and Spanko run amok in a colorful world where reason is overrated, featuring the thumping, riotously fun music of the Asylum Street Spankers." A beautiful hand-animated short inspired by and done to the song "Monkey Rag" by Asylum Street Spankers.  You can find the full short on YouTube at http://youtu.be/HqJQAgBPBSA
title: Monkey Rag
